name: Game Labyrinth
description:
Game labyrinth
A new logical game for your leisure.

Rules of the game:
In each level, time is given for the passage of the labyrinth. It is necessary to bring the plane through the labyrinth to the island. If the player does not complete the task, the level begins anew. A simple interesting game for children and adults.

The game develops logical thinking and observation. The game does not require an Internet connection.
